virtual-scroll-slice-size.desc: Number of options to render in the virtual list

virtual-scroll-item-size.desc: Default size in pixels (height if vertical, width if horizontal) of an option; This value is used for rendering the initial list; Try to use a value close to the minimum size of an item

virtual-scroll-sticky-size-start.desc: Size in pixels (height if vertical, width if horizontal) of the sticky part (if using one) at the start of the list; A correct value will improve scroll precision

virtual-scroll-sticky-size-end.desc: Size in pixels (height if vertical, width if horizontal) of the sticky part (if using one) at the end of the list; A correct value will improve scroll precision
